dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on map given in "Coudées sacrées", "Stades anciens", "Stades nouveaux", "Mille moyen d'Italie".
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation, travel paths, settlements, places of historical interest.
